planes.title: Contact
texts: To get in contact with me, simply use the buttons below.
Preferably write me an email or contact me on LinkedIn.

planes.title: Welcome
texts: Hello there, you've found my online portfolio!
You'll get to know me, my skills and much more here.
To navigate through the site, you can use
- your Arrow Keys
- the Scroll Wheel
- drag and drop or your Mouse
Feel free to take a look around :)

planes.title: About me
texts: I'm Tobias, a student and software
developer from Germany. I've finished
my bachelors degree in applied
computer science and I am currently
looking for my first full-time job.
In my free time I like to code, play video games
and ride my motorcycle through the countryside.

footer.text: Interested in working together? Let's talk!
